text: Baroi hec ʙasare sazovor nest, ki Alloh taolo ʙa u kitoʙ va hukm [donisu fahm] va pajomʙari dihad, sipas u ʙa mardum ʙigujad: "Ba coji Alloh taolo, ʙandagoni man ʙosed". Balki [sazovor ast, ki pajomʙaron ʙa mardum ʙigujand]: "Ba xotiri on, ki kitoʙ [-i Tavrot]-ro omuzis medoded va az on co, ki [aqoidu ahkomi onro ʙa digaron] dars medoded, [faqehonu donismandoni] ilohi ʙosed
